column2: Emerald Holding, Inc., formerly Emerald Expositions Events Inc., is an operator of business-to-business (B2B) trade shows. The Company operates across multiple sectors, which includes: Gift, Home and General Merchandise; Sports; Design and Construction; Technology; Jewelry; and others including Photography, Food, Healthcare, Industrials and Military. The Company operates approximately 55 trade shows, as well as other face-to-face events. It operates 10 trade shows in the Gift, Home and General Merchandise sector; 17 trade shows in Sports sector; eight trade shows in Design and Construction; seven trade shows in the Technology sector; five trade shows in Jewelry sector; and other trade shows include 10 shows across sectors.
